com.kissmetrics.sdk

Class ArchiverImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kissmetrics.sdk.ArchiverImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Archiver

    public class ArchiverImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Archiver
    ArchiverImpl Handles read/write of settings, identity, recorded events and properties. Recorded events and properties are URL encoded before being saved to a send queue.

      • archiveFirstIdentity

        public void archiveFirstIdentity(java.lang.String identity)
        Archives first identity to Shared Preferences. Used when establishing a new identity that is not aliased to any other identity. Nothing is passed to KISSmetrics as a result of archiving a first identity.
        Specified by:
        archiveFirstIdentity in interface Archiver
        Parameters:
        identity - A new, anonymous identity

        Specified by:

      • archiveDistinctProperty

        public void archiveDistinctProperty(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String value)
        Adds 1 property to the sendQueue if the value is different than the current value for the provided name(key). Archives the updated sendQueue to Internal Storage. Adds this property to mSavedProperties and archives to savedProperties.
        Specified by:
        archiveDistinctProperty in interface Archiver
        Parameters:
        name - Property name(key)
        value - Property value for name(key)

      • archiveIdentity

        public void archiveIdentity(java.lang.String identity)
        Sets value of mLastIdentity. Archives mLastIdentity to Shared Preferences. Adds an alias query to the sendQueue. Archives the updated sendQueue to Internal Storage.
        Specified by:
        archiveIdentity in interface Archiver
        Parameters:
        identity - A new user identity

        Specified by:
        archiveAlias in interface Archiver
        Parameters:
        alias - An alias to an identity
        identity - A known user identity

      • removeQueryString

        public void removeQueryString(int index)
        Removes a query string from the sendQueue at the specified index. Intended to be used to remove successful API queries or malformed queries to prevent repeated attempts to query the KISSmetrics API with URL strings that will never succeed.
        Specified by:
        removeQueryString in interface Archiver
        Parameters:
        index - Query string index in the sendQueue
